projects.title: Tongs
projects.summary: Tongs is an application that lets you choose a random YouTube Video and play it while a random Audio of a different YouTube Video is played. Search is still being implemnted.

projects.title: Home.ie
projects.summary: This application allows users to better maintain a clean and happy living environment with other housemates/roommates

projects.title: Clicky Game
projects.summary: You have to click on each character once as they shuffle after each click.

projects.title: Hangman Game
projects.summary: A web Hangman game with small dictionary of 5 letter words
